scripts.generate-from-defs: pnpm exec ts-node --esm node_modules/.bin/polkadot-types-from-defs  --package parachain-api/interfaces --input build/interfaces --endpoint build/litentry-parachain-metadata.json
scripts.generate-from-chain: pnpm exec ts-node --esm node_modules/.bin/polkadot-types-from-chain --package parachain-api/interfaces --output build/interfaces --endpoint build/litentry-parachain-metadata.json --strict
scripts.build: pnpm run prepare-dir && pnpm run generate-from-defs && pnpm run generate-from-chain && pnpm run format && pnpm run compile
